import requests
import json
import pandas as pd

launches_url = "https://api.spacexdata.com/v4/launches"
headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json"}

response = requests.get(launches_url)
launches_data = response.json()

df_fact_launches = pd.json_normalize(
    launches_data,
    record_path=['cores'], 
    meta=[
        'id',
        'flight_number',
        'name',
        'date_utc',
        'rocket',
        'success',
        'details',
        'launchpad',
        ['fairings', 'reused'],
        ['fairings', 'recovered'],
        ['fairings', 'ships'],
        'payloads'  
    ],
    sep='_',
    errors='ignore'
)

df_fact_launches = df_fact_launches.explode('payloads').reset_index(drop=True)

df_fact_launches.rename(columns={'payloads': 'payload_id'}, inplace=True)

df_fact_launches['failure_reason'] = df_fact_launches['id'].map(
    lambda x: next((launch.get('failures')[0]['reason']
                    for launch in launches_data
                    if launch['id'] == x and launch.get('failures')), None)
)

df_fact_launches['failure_altitude'] = df_fact_launches['id'].map(
    lambda x: next((launch.get('failures')[0]['altitude']
                    for launch in launches_data
                    if launch['id'] == x and launch.get('failures')), None)
)

df_fact_launches['failure_time'] = df_fact_launches['id'].map(
    lambda x: next((launch.get('failures')[0]['time']
                    for launch in launches_data
                    if launch['id'] == x and launch.get('failures')), None)
)

df_fact_launches = df_fact_launches.loc[:, ~df_fact_launches.columns.str.startswith('links')]
df_fact_launches.columns = df_fact_launches.columns.str.replace(r'\W+', '_', regex=True)

df_dim_cores = pd.json_normalize(cores_data)
df_dim_cores.drop('launches', axis=1, inplace=True)
df_dim_cores.rename(columns={'id': 'core_id', 'status': 'core_status', 'serial': 'core_serial', 'block': 'core_block'}, inplace=True)
